mapper.sql: ID, APP_ID, OLD_CLOSING_DATE, NEW_CLOSING_DATE, ALTER_DAY, ALTER_INTEREST, APPLY_COMMENT, APPLY_STATUS, APPLY_EFFECT_DATE, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DATE, PROC_INST_ID
mapper.insert:
insert into t_apply_alter_repaydate
ID,
APP_ID,
OLD_CLOSING_DATE,
NEW_CLOSING_DATE,
ALTER_DAY,
ALTER_INTEREST,
APPLY_COMMENT,
APPLY_STATUS,
APPLY_EFFECT_DATE,
CREATE_ID,
CREATE_DATE,
PROC_INST_ID,

mapper.update:
update t_apply_alter_repaydate
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLD_CLOSING_DATE = #{oldClosingDate,jdbcType=DATE},
NEW_CLOSING_DATE = #{newClosingDate,jdbcType=DATE},
ALTER_DAY = #{alterDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ALTER_INTEREST = #{alterInterest,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
APPLY_COMMENT = #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_STATUS = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_EFFECT_DATE = #{applyEffectDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_apply_alter_repaydate set APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLD_CLOSING_DATE = #{oldClosingDate,jdbcType=DATE}, NEW_CLOSING_DATE = #{newClosingDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ALTER_DAY = #{alterDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ALTER_INTEREST = #{alterInterest,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, APPLY_COMMENT = #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_STATUS = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_EFFECT_DATE = #{applyEffectDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.APP_ID as appId, d.CONTRACT_NO as contractNo, b.NAME as custName, b.ID_NO as idNo, a.OLD_CLOSING_DATE as oldClosingDate, a.NEW_CLOSING_DATE as newClosingDate, a.ALTER_DAY as alterDay, a.ALTER_INTEREST as alterInterest, a.CREATE_DATE as applyDate, e.DICT_DATA_NAME as applyStatus, a.APPLY_COMMENT as applyComment, c.NAME_ as taskName, f.ACCOUNT_NAME as assignee from t_apply_alter_repaydate a left join T_APPLY_TENANT b on a.APP_ID = b.APP_ID left join ACT_RU_TASK c on a.PROC_INST_ID = c.PROC_INST_ID_ left join T_SIGN_CONTRACT d on a.APP_ID = d.APP_ID left join SYS_DICT_DATA e on a.APPLY_STATUS = e.DICT_DATA_CODE left join SYS_ACCOUNT f on c.ASSIGNEE_ = f.ACCOUNT_ID where a.CREATE_ID = #{createId}
